add.description: Missing explicit API endpoint for GET /api/v1/cart to retrieve cart contents, individual subtotals, and cart total. LLD does not specify the API contract or response structure for this endpoint.
add.reason: Story acceptance criteria requires retrieval of cart contents and totals via API, but LLD only describes repository/service logic without API contract details.

add.description: Missing UI redirection logic for empty cart state ('continue shopping' link). LLD does not specify this behavior in CartService or Cart Model.
add.reason: Story acceptance criteria mandates UI redirection for empty cart, but LLD omits this workflow.

add.description: Missing explicit API endpoint for PUT /api/v1/cart/items/{itemId} to update quantity. LLD describes repository update logic but does not specify API contract or validation rules.
add.reason: Story requires API for updating cart item quantity, but LLD omits API specification.

add.description: Missing explicit API endpoint for DELETE /api/v1/cart/items/{itemId} to remove item from cart. LLD describes repository remove logic but does not specify API contract or response.
add.reason: Story requires API for removing cart item, but LLD omits API specification.

add.description: Missing explicit definition of CartItem entity with current Price Snapshot field. LLD CartItem model does not include price snapshot for historical pricing.
add.reason: Story requires CartItem to store current price snapshot, but LLD omits this field.

modify.current_state: CartService.calculateTotals calculates subtotal, tax, shipping, discount, and total, but does not specify automatic recalculation upon quantity mutation.
modify.required_change: Ensure CartService triggers subtotal and total recalculation automatically whenever item quantity is updated.
modify.reason: Story requires automatic recalculation of cart totals upon quantity mutation, but LLD does not guarantee this behavior.
